reasoning: Ritual compulsions are a core manifestation of OCD. Annual incidence of OCD-related compulsions estimated at 3.5 per 100k; prevalence ~8.2 per 100k among those with OCD diagnosis. Specific behavioral symptom subset of OCD.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2005). Lifetime prevalence and age-of-onset distributions of DSM-IV disorders in the National Comorbidity Survey Replication. Arch Gen Psychiatry. 62(6):593-602
